name: ixnode/php-cli-image
description: PHP Cli Image - This library converts a given image to ASCII string.

scripts.phpcs:check: bin/header/phpcs 'php-cs-fixer --dry-run --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix src 2>/dev/null && php-cs-fixer --dry-run --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix tests 2>/dev/null' 'all'
scripts.phpcs:fix: bin/header/phpcs 'php-cs-fixer --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix src 2>/dev/null && php-cs-fixer --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix tests 2>/dev/null' 'all'

scripts-descriptions.phpcs:check: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:fix: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Fix, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks all types (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd:all: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers.
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers.
scripts-descriptions.phpstan:xdebug: Runs PHPStan (PHP Static Analysis Tool with xdebug setting).
scripts-descriptions.test: Runs all available tests (phpmnd, phpunit, phpstan, phpcs, rector, etc.).
scripts-descriptions.test:all: Runs all available tests (phpmnd, phpunit, phpstan, phpcs, phpmd).
scripts-descriptions.test:hardcore: Runs the ultimate available tests (phpmnd, phpunit, phpstan, phpcs, rector, phpmd).
scripts-descriptions.test:most: Runs most tests (phpmnd, phpunit, phpstan, phpcs).
